arts.sum: The New Saints battled to a 2-0 defeat against Fiorentina in their first ever Europa Conference League group game, with Yacine Adli and Moise Kean on target for the hosts

arts.ttl: Conference League | Fiorentina 2-0 TNS: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina kicked off their Conference League campaign with a hard-fought 2-0 win against Welsh side The New Saints at the Stadio Artemio Franchi. Despite dominating possession and creating numerous chances, the Italian side struggled to break down their resilient opponents until late in the second half. The Viola, finalists in the competition for the past two seasons, controlled the game from the outset but were frustrated by their own wastefulness in front of goal. Jonathan Ikoné and Christian Kouamé both squandered good opportunities in the first half, while Lucas Beltrán forced a save from a tight angle. arts.ttl: Conference League | Fiorentina v TNS: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Fiorentina are set to begin their journey in the new single-group format of the Conference League with a relatively manageable challenge as they welcome Welsh side The New Saints to the Stadio Artemio Franchi. Raffaele Palladino’s Viola side are eager to secure their first three points after a challenging start to the season. In goal, Pietro Terracciano is likely to replace David de Gea, who may be rested for this fixture. The defense is expected to line up in a back three formation, featuring Dodo Kayode, Lucas Martinez Quarta, and Cristiano Biraghi.
